review: Horrible at keeping a wifi connection, underpowered and only of very limited usefulness. I ended up buying an Apple TV.

review: Bought this solely for Netflix. It worked for about 2 hours and then stopped working with the Netflix app. A quick Google search shows hundreds of others having this problem with no solution in sight. Will be returning and switching to a Roku.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Joke of a product compared to the raspberrypi. This actually made my kids cry. WTF google?
